goal.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the development and main currents of nineteenth century French novel. Students are expected to develop their ability to read and analyze long texts.
goal.ch: 十九世紀為法國小說的黃金時期。本課程的目標在於引領同學認識十九世紀的法國小說。除了簡述法國小說的發展和重要的流派之外，也介紹小說分析的方法。希望藉由法國小說的課程能夠進一步提昇同學對於較長文本的閱讀能力和分析能力。

content.en: This course is designed to study nineteenth century French novels. We will explore and compare the features of different types of novels. Special emphasis will also be put on the structure, the plot, the characterization, the dialogue as well as the organization of time and space.
content.ch: 以十九世紀法國小說為主，預計研讀二至三部小說。課堂講授與討論尤其側重小說的結構、情節、人物、對話、時間和空間的安排以及各類型小說的特徵。
